duties_responsibilities.duty: Build and implement security systems applications for successful project completion and optimization for the client.
Deploy and manage virtual infrastructure for Physical Security Applications through Infra-as-code.
Support all Physical Security network, including Allow-listing through MAB, DHCP address reservation, Manage ACL’s, and port configurations.
Deploy and support internal GLB’s and enforce all network and infrastructure standards for the org.
Communicate with technology partners, Project Leads, client operators, and external vendors regarding maintenance that affects production or projects.
Project Management of new application integration or large-scale projects that change the current production.
Work with network administration and hardware technicians, maintain and patch application servers, and collaborate with partners, vendors, teams, and leadership to resolve system outages.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or GED required
